Detailed Description

Polygonal mesh class.

This class implements a 3D object polygonal mesh. Its faces may reference the local faces or the global engine BSP faces. The class members are the number of faces and vertices of the mesh, as well as pointers to the faces, vertices and edge normals. The methods supplied are for ray-intersection, normals computation, illumination, and much more.

Fly3D Game Engine ver 2.0 - http://www.fly3d.com.br
